message: Hi Bob, let's split the money evenly to be fair.
I'd like a bit more, as I think I can make better use of it.
I understand you want more Bob, but I also need a fair share.  This offer is a compromise.
Let's meet closer to the middle of our previous offers.
This seems like a reasonable middle ground, Bob. Let's settle this.
I'm willing to give up a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's very close to a 50/50 split, but gives me a slight edge. We're running out of time to make a deal!
